results.title: Kalee Indomitable Model 8 Front Shutter Projector
results.brief_description:
Manufactured in Leeds, England by A.Kershaw & Son, and brought into Australia prior to the introduction of ‘the talkies’. Complete with Trutrim lamp house.

results.title: Simplex International 35mm Cinema Projector
results.brief_description: Patented 1916. With Western Electric sound head and Hamilton Baker lamp house (was originally manufactured as silent projector and later used with disc sound).

results.title: Behind the mountain
results.brief_description: This collaborative video installation presents floor projections in randomly scattered blank cardboard boxes, encased within the borders of each the image of a moving figure of a mixed Aboriginal demographic, confined and enclosed in the space through the image size. The viewer moves in amongst and interacts with these images, their shadow visible over the image as they lean to look into each box. The figures within, dancers filmed from the Bangarra Dance Company, contort and rotate in the limits of the space, pulling inwards and pushing outwards, visually and spatially engaging in the historical and contemporary forces which construct and confine the Aboriginal body. In interaction with these images the use of a surround sound composite creates an aural journey that evokes pulsing electrical currents in a storage space, interrupted sporadically by the sound of tearing packing tape and a strong bass sound from below each box which creates a sensorial engagement with the movement in the images within.

production_dates.notes: 'behind the mountains' is a commission for the ACMI and NGV exhibition 2004

results.title: Head of Instagram scrambles after backlash
results.material_description: Digital screen recording of @mosseri's Instagram post
results.brief_description: Instagram has been trialling some new features for video content- and they have not been well received. Following criticism from some high profile celebrities, ranging from Kylie Jenner to Roxane Gay, Head of Instagram Adam Mosseri posted a defense of the platform’s perceived pivot to video, euphemistically acknowledging the changes as “not yet good.” Mosseri seems worried, and he’s right to be: Jenner, who has 361 million Instagram followers, is not averse to exerting her influence. In 2018 her criticism of a Snapchat update caused the company to lose US$1.3billion in market value, and they quickly withdrew several changes.
results.description:
This video features in a responsive display in the museum that presents the moments, stories and memes capturing the zeitgeist by going viral on the internet.

Instagram has been trialing some new features for video content - and they have not been well received. Following criticism from some high profile celebrities, ranging from Kylie Jenner to Roxane Gay, Head of Instagram Adam Mosseri posted a defense of the platform’s perceived pivot to video, euphemistically acknowledging the changes as “not yet good”. Mosseri seems worried, and he’s right to be: Jenner, who has 361 million Instagram followers, is not averse to exerting her influence. In 2018 her criticism of a Snapchat update caused the company to lose US$1.3billion in market value, and they quickly withdrew several changes.

Following criticism from some high profile celebrities, ranging from Kylie Jenner to Roxane Gay, Head of Instagram Adam Mosseri posted a defense of the platform’s perceived pivot to video, euphemistically acknowledging the changes as “not yet good”. Mosseri seems worried, and he’s right to be: Jenner, who has 361 million Instagram followers, is not averse to exerting her influence. In 2018 her criticism of a Snapchat update caused the company to lose US$1.3billion in market value.

results.title: An Airman at sea
results.brief_description: As Keith flew from Townsville to Milne Bay in Papua New Guinea, he wondered if he would ever see the shores of Australia again. Suffering from dengue fever, Keith battled illness the whole time. He made it back when the war ended and would go on to serve in the RAFF for 20 years.

results.title: A Rookie airman's story
results.brief_description: Cliff’s father was a fisherman, so he knew about boats. After joining the airforce in 1942 he would spend the majority of his service running missions on boats. Lucky he didn’t tell them he couldn’t swim.

results.title: On borrowed time
results.brief_description: Keith was a member of a Catalina crew in the airforce and the loss of their captain on a mission affected the whole crew. After almost drowning in the plane as she went down in the ocean crash, Keith was not able to fly again.
results.description: Keith was a member of a Catalina crew in the airforce and the loss of their captain on a mission affected the whole crew. After almost drowning in the plane as she went down in the ocean crash, Keith was not able to fly again.

results.title: In my blood
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Jack Bell and ACMI
results.brief_description: Serving in Libya , Jack was captured and became a POW. Almost dying from injures , he would spend over 3 months in prisoner camps in Europe. Today he still remember his mates who didn’t make it and the doctor who who saved his life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Jack Bell and ACMI

results.title: Will you hold my hand?
results.brief_description: Pegg Utting was one of the first women to join the newly formed WAAAF in 1941. Her son would later join up to serve in Vietnam aged 17. Like so many others he struggled to fit in when he returned. After many years, he was finally invited to March with the RSL and it was Peg’s loving support that got him through this.

results.title: Why did we fight?: the experience of a Vietnamese Veteran
results.brief_description: Hung and his family were originally from North Vietnam but after fleeing as a child to the South, he would follow in this father’s footsteps and join the army to fight for freedom. After being captured and spending years in re-education camps, his family finally decided to flee to Australia to start a new life.
